leading-relaxed","children":"感时花溅泪，恨别鸟惊心。"}],["$","blockquote","6",{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 pl-4 my-6 text-stone-700 italic text-lg leading-relaxed","children":"烽火连三月，家书抵万金。"}],["$","blockquote","7",{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 pl-4 my-6 text-stone-700 italic text-lg leading-relaxed","children":"白头搔更短，浑欲不胜簪。"}],["$","hr","8",{"className":"my-8 border-stone-200"}],["$","h2","9",{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-stone-800 mt-8 mb-4 pb-2 border-b border-stone-200","children":"译文"}],["$","p","10",{"className":"text-stone-600 leading-relaxed my-4","children":"长安沦陷，国家破碎，只有山河依旧；春天来了，人烟稀少的长安城里草木茂密。"}],["$","p","11",{"className":"text-stone-600 leading-relaxed my-4","children":"感伤国事，不禁涕泪四溅，鸟鸣惊心，徒增离愁别恨。"}],["$","p","12",{"className":"text-stone-600 leading-relaxed my-4","children":"连绵的战火已经延续了半年多，家书难得，一封抵得上万两黄金。"}],["$","p","13",{"className":"text-stone-600 leading-relaxed my-4","children":"愁绪缠绕，白发愈搔愈短，简直要插不上头了。"}],["$","hr","14",{"className":"my-8 border-stone-200"}],["$","h2","15",{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-stone-800 mt-8 mb-4 pb-2 border-b border-stone-200","children":"创作背景"}],["$","p","16",{"className":"text-stone-600 leading-relaxed my-4","children":"唐玄宗天宝十五年（756年）七月，安禄山攻陷长安，肃宗在灵武即位。杜甫在投奔灵武途中被俘，被困长安。次年三月，春回大地，鸟语花香，草木茂盛，但长安城满目荒凉，诗人触景生情，写下了这首传诵千古的五律。"}],["$","hr","17",{"className":"my-8 border-stone-200"}],["$","h2","18",{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-stone-800 mt-8 mb-4 pb-2 border-b border-stone-200","children":"名句赏析"}],["$","p","19",{"className":"font-semibold text-stone-800 my-4 text-lg","children":"\"烽火连三月，家书抵万金\""}],["$","p","20",{"className":"text-stone-600 leading-relaxed my-4","children":"战争年代，亲人之间的消息隔绝，一封家信显得无比珍贵。诗人用\"抵万金\"来形容家书的珍贵，表达了战乱中对亲人的深切思念。"}],["$","hr","21",{"className":"my-8 border-stone-200"}],["$","div","22",{"className":"mt-8 pt-4 border-t border-stone-200","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"flex flex-wrap gap-2","children":[["$","span","0",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-stone-100 text-stone-600 text-sm
